mapper.insert: insert into TBL_PAYMENT (pay_res_rid, pay_mem_id, pay_date, pay_type) values (#{pay_res_rid}, #{pay_mem_id}, #{pay_date}, #{pay_type})
mapper.select: select p.pay_mem_id, p.pay_date, p.pay_type, p.pay_res_rid, r.res_totalpay from TBL_PAYMENT as p JOIN TBL_RESERVE as r ON p.pay_res_rid = r.res_rid;
mapper.update: update TBL_MEMBER set mem_point = mem_point - #{point_cost} where mem_id = #{pay_mem_id}
